articles.author: Cass Marshall
articles.title: League of Legends’ Star Guardians return for a big summer event
articles.description: League of Legends’ Star Guardians will appear in League of Legends, Wild Rift, and Legends of Runeterra in a two-part event. Here’s why the Star Guardians, despite being from an alternate universe, keep coming back.
articles.content: A big Star Guardians event is coming to Riot Games League of Legends, Wild Rift, and Legends of Runeterra on July 14. A host of characters from the various rosters are getting new Star Guardian skins… [+3999 chars]

articles.author: Austen Goslin
articles.title: Game of Thrones books have a different ending, George R.R. Martin says
articles.description: A Song of Ice and Fire author, George R.R. Martin, has doubled down on his previous statements about Game of Thrones, saying that his books will have a very different ending from the HBO show.
articles.content: George R.R. Martin has offered his latest update on the next entry in his A Song of Ice and Fire series, The Winds of Winter. The latest news comes from Martins Not A Blog website, where he said on F… [+2961 chars]

articles.author: Pete Volk
articles.title: Netflix Korean action movie Carter’s trailer looks fantastic
articles.description: Carter, the upcoming Korean action movie on Netflix, has a new trailer filled with hard-hitting action. It’s set to release on Netflix in August.

articles.author: Owen S. Good
articles.title: Hitman 3 July content roadmap includes Ambrose Island release date
articles.description: Hitman 3 players will get Ambrose Island, a free sandbox location to explore, on July 26, IO Interactive said. The new location closes out a month of pirate-themed content.
articles.content: A wretched hive ruled by a ruthless warlord is free to everyone with the game

articles.author: Austen Goslin
articles.title: Pokémon Puzzle League comes to Nintendo Switch Online in July
articles.description: Pokémon Puzzle League is coming to Nintendo Switch on July 15. The game will be part of the Online + Expansion Pass subscription.
articles.content: The game will be part of Nintendo Switch Online + Expansion Pass

articles.author: Oli Welsh
articles.title: Supermassive’s next horror game The Devil in Me launches in fall 2022
articles.description: The fourth game in the Dark Pictures Anthology, which stars Jessie Buckley, gets a new story trailer. It will be released for PC, PlayStation and Xbox in the fall.
articles.content: Jessie Buckley stars in the fourth Dark Pictures game

articles.author: Zosha Millman
articles.title: Uniqlo’s new Spy x Family shirts let you rep the year’s best anime series
articles.description: Anya Folger has become a meme thanks to 12 episodes of Spy x Family. But while you wait for the new season (and the dub) to release, you can sport Uniqlo’s latest T-shirt collection.
articles.content: When Anya Folger isnt busy putting bullies in their place, taking over the manga universe, or helping with her dads missions, she is sporting the latest Eden Academy looks, and now you can too or at … [+1006 chars]

articles.author: Joshua Rivera
articles.title: Watch the gameplay trailer for The Lord of the Rings: Gollum
articles.description: It’s not a movie starring Chris Hemsworth, but the first gameplay trailer shows off lots of stealth sequences. So many stealth sequences. We hope you like stealth sequences. The game is available on PC, PlayStation 4, PlayStation 5, Xbox One, Xbox Series X|S …
articles.content: It lookses like wet fishes doesnt it, precious, yes

articles.author: Owen S. Good
articles.title: Apex Legends Mobile gets season 2 release date and new Legend: Rhapsody
articles.description: Apex Legends Mobile season 2 begins July 12 for players on Android and iOS devices. The new season brings Rhapsody, another new character exclusive to the mobile game.
articles.content: Next season gets started July 12 on Android and iOS

articles.author: Toussaint Egan
articles.title: Daredevil and Kingpin will appear in Marvel’s Echo series
articles.description: Charlie Cox and Vincent D’Onofrio will be reprising the roles of Daredevil and Kingpin in the upcoming MCU television series Echo. Cox and D’Onofrio recently appeared as their respective characters in Spider-Man: No Way Home and Disney Plus’ Hawkeye series.
articles.content:
Charlie Cox and Vincent DOnofrio will be reprising their roles as Daredevil and Kingpin in the upcoming MCU television series Echo.
